Projects

Sybil-Vane

Developed a sentiment analysis tool utilizing Python and spaCy deep learning and natural language processing models to detect bias in different media companies on real-time events. Applied JSON Dictionaries to store text data, amassing 350+ articles and approximately 560,000 words, including all respective companies, headlines, authors, and sentiment figures.Built a robust training algorithm with 3 criteria and 2 worked-out examples to optimize a sub-model named entity recognition (NER) capabilities.

Market-Vision

Created a model that utilizes pandas to gather, organize, and score financial data from 30 active stocks daily based on 5 technical and 6 fundamental analysis standards. Utilized JSON Dictionaries to store ticker info and provide a historical reference to train OpenAI API-driven learning model to average past scores.Optimized model efficiency to bring OpenAIâ€™s API usage cost per 1,000,000 tokens from $10.00 to $0.15 by refining data organization and model training instructions.

PyTorch-Projects

Deployed pre-trained neural and cycle-GAN networks with PyTorch to perform computer vision and image domain transformation tasks. Utilized NumPy to organize 700+ batches of text, tabular, time-series, and image data in 3 dimensions and higher. Implemented ImageNet 1000+ database of images and ground truths into models for reference.

Experience

Science Olympiad

Used Excel to manage and track budgets for multiple teams based on the overall budget and complexity of the project. Employed pywin32 to promote collaboration and transparency by displaying data in readable formats through Office 365 applications.

Scientists of Tomorrow Podcast

Generated approximately 200 minutes of content using DaVinci Resolve and international listener bases. AI for Data Science CalPoly API

Developed a CalPoly API by creating developer tools for all Cal Poly information. Used vector embeddings and cosine similiarities to reduce token cost of OpenAI server. Stored 800,000+ units of data in JSON and MongoDB
